name: file-information
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
List information about a file's content.

List information about the content of a data file.  Only one -only option may be specified.  The information listed when no -only option is present is dependent upon the type of data file.

Library paths:
   /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt5/plugins
   /mnt/c/Users/floru/Projects/cmi/nopype/extraction/workbench/source/build/CommandLine


File and extensions for reading and writing:
   Annotation: wb_annot
   Annotation Text Substitution: wb_annsub.csv
   Border: border, wb_border
   CIFTI - Dense: dconn.nii
   CIFTI - Dense Label: dlabel.nii
   CIFTI - Dense Parcel: dpconn.nii
   CIFTI - Dense Scalar: dscalar.nii
   CIFTI - Dense Data Series: dtseries.nii
   CIFTI - Fiber Orientations TEMPORARY: fiberTEMP.nii
   CIFTI - Fiber Trajectory TEMPORARY: trajTEMP.wbsparse
   CIFTI - Parcel: pconn.nii
   CIFTI - Parcel Dense: pdconn.nii
   CIFTI - Parcel Label: plabel.nii
   CIFTI - Parcel Scalar: pscalar.nii
   CIFTI - Parcel Series: ptseries.nii
   CIFTI - Scalar Data Series: sdseries.nii
   CZI Image: czi
   Foci: foci, wb_foci
   Histology Slices: metaczi, meta-image
   Image Read: bmp, gif, jpeg, jpg, png, ppm
        Write: bmp, jpeg, jpg, png, ppm
   Label: label.gii
   Metric: func.gii, shape.gii
   Palette: palette, wb_palette
   RGBA: rgba.gii
   Samples: wb_samples
   Scene: scene, wb_scene
   Specification: spec, wb_spec
   Surface: surf.gii
   Volume: nii, nii.gz

inputs.name: opt_no_map_info
inputs.description: do not show map information for files that support maps

inputs.name: opt_only_step_interval
inputs.description: suppress normal output, print the interval between maps

inputs.name: opt_only_number_of_maps
inputs.description: suppress normal output, print the number of maps

inputs.name: opt_only_map_names
inputs.description: suppress normal output, print the names of all maps

inputs.name: only_metadata
inputs.description: suppress normal output, print file metadata

type.name: only_metadata
type.description: suppress normal output, print file metadata

inputs.name: opt_key_key
inputs.description: only print the metadata for one key, with no formatting: the metadata key

inputs.name: opt_only_cifti_xml
inputs.description: suppress normal output, print the cifti xml if the file type has it

inputs.name: opt_czi
inputs.description: For a CZI file, show information from the libCZI Info Command instead of the Workbench CZI File

inputs.name: opt_czi_all_sub_blocks
inputs.description: show all sub-blocks in CZI file (may produce long output)
